entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
